Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Transfiguration:

Text.Language: All/louia: all/louia. I/couc Pi,~rictoc Ps/ri m~V]: afsobtf e~jen pitwou n~Yabwr: all/louia: all/louia.
Alleluia Alleluia: Jesus Christ, the Son of God, was transfigured on mount Tabor: Alleluia Alleluia
الليلويا الليلويا يسوع المسيح ابن الله تجلي علي طور تابور. الليلويا الليلويا
